mapper.select: Select ETOD.ORDERNUMBER From eai_trans_order_data etod where etod.ordernumber in ('23-00056299')

select etod.ordernumber , etod.item_sku, etod.package_name , etod.item_quantity, etod.datas from PUBLIC.EAI_TRANS_ORDER_DATA ETOD where etod.delivery_date = to_date(#{deliveryDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and etod.ws_id = #{wsId} and etod.proc_date >= now() - interval '5 day' and etod.package_name like '%bottle%';
